Jianxiu.sql: SELECT top 1 id,fullcontent,repairtime FROM optkuser.tRepairMessage where repairtime>{0} AND repairtime<{1} order by repairtime;

Signal.sql: SELECT top 1 CAST(signal_id AS VARCHAR) || ',TBSIGNALBASIS_MODEL',signal_name,risk,SETTIME FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBSIGNALBASIS_MODEL where SETSIGNAL=1 and SETTIME>{0} AND SETTIME<{1} order by SETTIME
